channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Unruly weeds & grass ne t to 79 perry hall road, 18th June
item.description:
This greenery is totally overgrown and is an eyesore with litter now being thrown in it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Perry Hall Road, Poverest, London

item.title: I known car dumped for 5 weeks, 18th June
item.description:
This car does not belong to anyone in Albert Road BR53AF it first appeared 5 weeks ago, nobody has been back since it’s covered in leaves and SAP has noticeable damage and is causing a nuisance as it’s preventing residents from parking near their homes

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Albert Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loading bay always busy, 18th June
item.description:
Every day, vehicles are left parked all day in the loading and unloading bay, complicating traffic in the area. HGVs are having problems because there's no parking space.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Two bags of builders rubble/rubbish left on highway, 18th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Lochaber Road, Blackheath, London
